name: Upstream
description:
This is an entry My First Game Jam: Summer 2018. With the theme of water,  I decided to reuse some assets I had created previously to make my first "full" game in Unity.

Players must use the bubbles, clams, and light rays as speed boosts to reach the finish line before their three opponents.

Devlog: https://itch.io/jam/my-first-game-jam-summer-2018/topic/258759/dev-log-upstream

Personal Site: taylornodell.com

Thanks to Marty for help with some of the music:

https://soundcloud.com/marty-strauss

Thanks to Blaque X for the background image:

https://pexels.com/photo/blue-blur-color-dark-932638/
